## Classes

### <a name="sshkeymgmt"></a>`sshkeymgmt`

Create Unix users and Unix groups and roll out the ssh keys of the users.
Groups of users can be defined and rolled out.
A user is regarded as a user group with only one member.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include sshkeymgmt
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `sshkeymgmt` class:

* [`users`](#-sshkeymgmt--users)
* [`groups`](#-sshkeymgmt--groups)
* [`ssh_key_groups`](#-sshkeymgmt--ssh_key_groups)
* [`authorized_keys_base_dir`](#-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_base_dir)
* [`authorized_keys_owner`](#-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_owner)
* [`authorized_keys_group`](#-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_group)
* [`authorized_keys_permissions`](#-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_permissions)
* [`authorized_keys_base_dir_permissions`](#-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_base_dir_permissions)

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--users"></a>`users`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash with all defined Unix users

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--groups"></a>`groups`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash with all defined Unix groups

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--ssh_key_groups"></a>`ssh_key_groups`

Data type: `Hash`

Group of users to deploy on a host together with their aah keys

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_base_dir"></a>`authorized_keys_base_dir`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Base directory where to place ssh authorized keys files. Set this parameter if authorized keys files should not be located in user's
home directory

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_owner"></a>`authorized_keys_owner`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

This parameter must be set if authorized_keys_base_dir is not empty. This parameter sets the owner of the authorized keys file.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_group"></a>`authorized_keys_group`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

This parameter must be set if authorized_keys_base_dir is not empty. This paremeter sets the group of the authorized keys file.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_permissions"></a>`authorized_keys_permissions`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

This parameter must be set if authorized_keys_base_dir is not empty. This parameter sets the file permissions of the
authorized keys file.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--authorized_keys_base_dir_permissions"></a>`authorized_keys_base_dir_permissions`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

The permissions of the directory containing the ssh kex files if not stored within the user's home directory.

Default value: `undef`

## Defined types

### <a name="sshkeymgmt--add_users"></a>`sshkeymgmt::add_users`

Add users together with their ssh keys to the local uasers on an Unix host

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `sshkeymgmt::add_users` defined type:

* [`ssh_users`](#-sshkeymgmt--add_users--ssh_users)

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--add_users--ssh_users"></a>`ssh_users`

Data type: `Array`

List of users

### <a name="sshkeymgmt--create_user"></a>`sshkeymgmt::create_user`

Create Unix users

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `sshkeymgmt::create_user` defined type:

* [`uid`](#-sshkeymgmt--create_user--uid)
* [`gid`](#-sshkeymgmt--create_user--gid)
* [`homedir`](#-sshkeymgmt--create_user--homedir)
* [`comment`](#-sshkeymgmt--create_user--comment)
* [`shell`](#-sshkeymgmt--create_user--shell)
* [`password`](#-sshkeymgmt--create_user--password)
* [`ensure`](#-sshkeymgmt--create_user--ensure)
* [`groups`](#-sshkeymgmt--create_user--groups)
* [`sshkeys`](#-sshkeymgmt--create_user--sshkeys)

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--create_user--uid"></a>`uid`

Data type: `Integer`

Numeric uid

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--create_user--gid"></a>`gid`

Data type: `Integer`

Numeric group id

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--create_user--homedir"></a>`homedir`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Home directory of the user. If empty it will be created from '/home' and the username

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--create_user--comment"></a>`comment`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Comment describing the user

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--create_user--shell"></a>`shell`

Data type: `String`

The Unix shell foer the user

Default value: `'/bin/bash'`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--create_user--password"></a>`password`

Data type: `String`

The password to be set

Default value: `'!!'`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--create_user--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`

Ensure if the user is present or absent. Valid values are 'present' or 'absent'.

Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--create_user--groups"></a>`groups`

Data type: `Array`

additional groups the user should belong to

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-sshkeymgmt--create_user--sshkeys"></a>`sshkeys`

Data type: `Array`

ssh keys to be added to the users authorized_keys file

Default value: `[]`
